name: Glacier Behemoth
description: The Glacier Behemoth is a massive creature known for its bulk and power, with thick natural armor protecting its body.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate terrain into difficult ground and deliver devastating melee attacks makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: The Glacier Behemoth likely seeks to establish dominance over its territory and crush any threats with its physical strength.
relations: It may be encountered in the company of other icy or mountainous creatures.
environment: Typically found in cold or icy regions.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and resilience, with immunity to cold damage and the ability to control the battlefield terrain.
weaknesses: Very low dexterity makes it easy to hit, and it lacks intelligence or charisma.
attacks: Performs powerful multiattacks with its bite, causing substantial piercing damage, and can charge through opponents for bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ground Disruptor ability allows it to turn terrain into difficult ground while moving.
senses: Possesses tremorsense and darkvision, with a passive perception of 16 for heightened awareness.
skills: Proficient in athletics, showcasing its incredible strength, and perception to detect hidden creatures.
additional_information: Immune to cold damage and several conditions.
Can move through difficult terrain without penalty.
Highly effective at grappling with a strength of 24.
Capable of executing an Inexorable Charge that does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Average wisdom aids in perception checks.
test_queries: massive cold immune creature that disrupts terrain
behemoth that charges and knocks creatures prone
hulking creature with powerful melee attacks
ice terrain manipulator with devastating bite attack
huge beast that can move through difficult terrain
